Methods

AddRowToStatblock(HtmlNode, HtmlNode)

Adds the provided stat to the provided statblock.

public static void AddRowToStatblock(HtmlNode statblock, HtmlNode stat)

Parameters

statblock HtmlNode

The HtmlNode representing the statblock to which the stat will be added.

stat HtmlNode

The HtmlNode representing the stat that will be added to the statblock.

AddRowToTable(HtmlNode, HtmlNode)

Adds a new stat to the specified HTML statblock. The stat is created from the provided HtmlNode, and cells are extracted based on specific criteria. If the stat is determined to be a header stat, the cells will be created with the 'th' tag; otherwise, they will be created with the 'td' tag.

public static void AddRowToTable(HtmlNode tableNode, HtmlNode rowNode)

Parameters

tableNode HtmlNode

The HtmlNode representing the statblock to which the stat will be added.

rowNode HtmlNode

The HtmlNode representing the stat that will be added to the statblock. The stat should contain span elements with class 'C9DxTc' and not contain nested span elements with class 'Apple-tab-span'.

public static bool ContainsListData(HtmlNode node)

node HtmlNode

The HtmlNode to inspect.

Returns

bool

True if the HtmlNode contains list data, false otherwise.

GetContentNodes(HtmlNode)

Gets the content nodes from the specified HTML node.

public static HtmlNodeCollection GetContentNodes(HtmlNode node)

Parameters

node HtmlNode

The HTML node.

Returns

HtmlNodeCollection

A collection of HTML nodes.

GetList(HtmlNode)

Creates a new HTML list node by extracting list items from the provided node. If a list item contains more than one span element, the content of the first span is wrapped in a bold ('b') tag. The resulting list structure is returned as an HtmlNode.

public static HtmlNode GetList(HtmlNode node)

Parameters

node HtmlNode

The HtmlNode representing the list to be processed. Must not be null.

Returns

HtmlNode

An HtmlNode containing the newly created list structure.

Remarks

The method specifically looks for 'li' elements within the provided node and processes 'span' elements within each list item. Note that the method currently ends with a 'NotImplementedException', indicating that it may not be complete.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if the provided node is null.

NotImplementedException

Thrown as the method is not fully implemented.

ParseSectionContent(HtmlNode)

Parses the content of a given HTML section node, extracting specific elements such as headings, lists, and paragraphs. If the content contains statblock data, it is organized into a statblock structure within the returned node.

public static HtmlNode ParseSectionContent(HtmlNode node)

Parameters

node HtmlNode

The HtmlNode representing the section to be parsed.

Returns

HtmlNode

An HtmlNode containing the parsed content, organized into a 'div' element, with any statblock data structured into 'statblock' elements.

Remarks

The method specifically looks for the following elements within the section: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, ul, ol, and p. If statblock data is detected, it is handled using the WOINWebPageHelper.ContainsTableData and WOINWebPageHelper.AddRowToTable methods.
